item.title: Sounds Like Gore Verbinksi’s ‘BioShock’ Movie Would’ve Been For the Sickos
item.description: If you loved 'A Cure for Wellness,' Verbinski's take on 'BioShock' might've been exactly your kind of movie had it actually gotten made.

item.title: New York is considering two bills to rein in the AI industry
item.description: New York's state legislature is set to consider a pair of bills that would require labels on AI-generated content and would put a three-year pause on new data center construction. The New York Fundamental Artificial Intelligence Requirements in News Act (NY FAIR News Act, for short) would require that any news "substantially composed, authored, or […]...

item.description: Exclusive: 'There are situations when you don’t want to pick up your phone, open an app, and tap through menus to steer your smart product.'

item.title: There's a sneaky way to watch the Super Bowl 2026 for free
item.description: All the ways to watch Super Bowl 2026 live streams for FREE from anywhere, as the New England Patriots take on the Seattle Seahawks.

item.title: How to stream the 2026 Super Bowl for free tonight: Patriots vs. Seahawks time, where to watch Super Bowl LX, start time, halftime show and more
item.description:
The 2026 Super Bowl between the New England Patriots and the Seattle Seahawks will air on NBC today, Feb. 8, at 6:30PM ET/3:30PM PT. The Big Game is also streaming live on Peacock. If you no longer subscribe to cable, don't have access to NBC over the air and aren't currently signed up for Peacock, there are still ways to watch Super Bowl LX — and Bad Bunny's history-making Super Bowl halftime show — for free. Here's how to tune in this afternoon. And if you're looking for live Super Bowl updates, we've got you covered. How to watch Super Bowl LX free:
Date: Sunday, Feb. 8 Time: 6:30 p.m...

item.title: ‘We watched the Berlin wall fall on this TV’: Guatemelan family shocks Samsung by trading in their indestructible 39-year-old CRT TV for a new LCD, calling it ‘a real workhorse’
item.description: A Guatemalan family recently stunned Samsung by trading in their 39-year-old "workhorse" CRT TV for a new LCD –and started a journey that's seen the set become an exhibit at the company's HQ.

item.title: How to watch Super Bowl on 7Plus (it's free)

item.title: AT&T's budget-friendly phone for kids was designed with parental controls in mind
item.description: It might be near impossible to be a kid these days without a smartphone, but AT&T wants to offer parents a decent compromise. The wireless carrier launched its AmiGO Jr. Phone, which combines Samsung hardware and AT&T's app, to offer kids a smartphone that has parental controls baked right in. The AmiGO Jr. Phone is just a Samsung Galaxy A16, which still remains a solid budget smartphone pick with a 50-megapixel main camera, a 6.7-inch display and reliable battery life. However, AT&T tweaked the Samsung hardware into its kid-friendly smartphone by including features like live location tracking...

item.title: Crypto.com places $70M bet on AI.com domain ahead of Super Bowl
item.description: The purchase rewrites the domain record books -- not that the crypto industry has ever been accused of restraint when it comes to spending.

item.title: Countries Across Europe Take Action to Ban Social Media for Minors
item.description: At least 15 governments on the continent are planning social media bans inspired by Australia.
